successful.pattern: Ethiopian instruments follow: enum → DIR_TO_CATEGORY → KEYWORD_TO_CATEGORY → GENRE_PROFILES
successful.context: When adding any new instrument category to instrument_manager.py
Always spawn Verifier before Builder to check existing state

successful.pattern: Subagents via runSubagent tool work reliably
successful.context: Use runSubagent for Builder and Verifier - they can read/edit files

successful.pattern: Time signature flow: GENRE_DEFAULTS → prompt_parser → ParsedPrompt → strategy → generator
successful.context: When implementing time signatures for any genre, ensure all layers pass the parameter

successful.pattern: Compound meter calculation: ticks_per_beat * numerator // 2 for /8 denominators
successful.context: 6/8 and 12/8 feel like 2 or 4 strong beats with subdivisions of 3

failed.pattern: Skipping pre-verification leads to wasted effort
failed.reason: Attempted to implement washint without checking if it existed first
failed.avoid_when: Any implementation task - always verify existing state first

failed.pattern: VS Code agent handoffs are UI-only, not autonomous
failed.reason: handoffs in .agent.md files just render buttons, don't spawn agents

decisions.decision: Use copilot-instructions.md as source of truth, not individual agent files
decisions.rationale: VS Code Copilot reads copilot-instructions.md; agent files are reference specs only

decisions.decision: Implement 4-file state system: orchestration, memory, context, handoffs
decisions.rationale: Separation of concerns - different update frequencies and purposes

decisions.decision: Supervisor never edits code directly - always delegates to Builder
decisions.rationale: Clean separation of concerns; Builder is specialized for minimal diffs

key_files: multimodal_gen/prompt_parser.py - instrument name parsing and aliases
multimodal_gen/stereo_utils.py - M/S encode/decode, width control, presets
multimodal_gen/audio_renderer.py - master chain, mix engine integration
multimodal_gen/mix_chain.py - effect chain processing, EffectType enum
multimodal_gen/parametric_eq.py - RBJ biquads, dynamic EQ, exciter, resonance suppression
docs/DYNAMIC_EQ_RESEARCH.md - spectral processing research and implementation guide
patterns: Ethiopian instruments: krar, masenqo, washint, begena, kebero
MIDI programs 110-113 reserved for Ethiopian instruments
Genre profiles define ideal SonicProfile for instrument matching
Audio pipeline: Tracks → MixBus → Effects → Master Sum → Master Chain → Limiter → Output
New effects follow: EffectType enum → Params dataclass → DSP.method() → MixChain.process()
RBJ biquad coefficients depend on filter type, frequency, Q, gain
Transposed Direct Form II: y[n] = b0*x[n] + w1; w1 = b1*x[n] - a1*y[n] + w2; w2 = b2*x[n] - a2*y[n]
Chebyshev polynomials: T_2=2x²-1, T_3=4x³-3x, T_4=8x⁴-8x²+1, T_5=16x⁵-20x³+5x
Ethiopian time signatures: ethiopian/eskista/ethio_jazz use (6, 8), ethiopian_traditional uses (12, 8)
Compound meter ticks: TICKS_PER_BEAT * numerator // 2 for /8 denominators (6/8 → 1440 ticks, 12/8 → 2880 ticks)
Time signature parameter flow: GENRE_DEFAULTS → prompt_parser.py → ParsedPrompt → strategy → midi_generator
gotchas: InstrumentCategory enum must match DIR_TO_CATEGORY and KEYWORD_TO_CATEGORY
assets_gen.py synthesis functions are separate from instrument_manager.py categorization
GENRE_PROFILES uses string keys matching InstrumentCategory.value
stereo_width > 1.0 can cause clipping - need limiter or soft-clip after decode
Use scipy.signal.butter with SOS output for numerical stability

math.decode: L = mid + side, R = mid - side

multiband_dynamics.key: Process bands in parallel, DC block after saturation

transient_shaper.key: 5ms lookahead, gain smoothing to prevent clicks

parametric_eq.algorithm: RBJ Audio EQ Cookbook biquads (W3C standard)
parametric_eq.implementation: Transposed Direct Form II for numerical stability

resonance_suppression.algorithm: FFT peak detection + adaptive notch filters

harmonic_exciter.harmonics: T_n(x) generates nth harmonic in isolation

spatial_audio.binaural: HRTF convolution with MIT KEMAR dataset

reference_matching.algorithm: LTAS (Long-Term Average Spectrum) difference → parametric EQ

stem_separation.key: Subprocess isolation, cache with MD5 hash

user_preferences.style: Follow RLM paper patterns, use subagents, maintain state
user_preferences.communication: Structured tables, clear verdicts, proofs required
